name: Compromise Accounts - Cloud Accounts (T1586.003)
description: Detects attempts to compromise cloud accounts such as AWS, Azure, GCP, or SaaS identities through failed authentication, suspicious API usage, or credential misuse.
author: Wahid Hendrawan
query: (process.args:(*aws* OR *azure* OR *gcp* OR *login.microsoftonline.com* OR *sts.amazonaws.com* OR *access_key* OR *secret_key*) AND event.outcome:failure) OR (event.dataset:cloud.authentication AND event.outcome:failure)
